content: 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet 4 times drop color a and with color b 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet 4 times round 7 this is the first squaring round each stitch in this round will be worked in a separate the next half_double_crochet from the previous round continuing with color b *3 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet chain 2 3 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet chain 2* switch to color a and repeat from * to * round 8 3 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet in chain-2 space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet then 3 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet switch to color b *3 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet in chain-2 space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet * repeat from * to * one more time switch back to color a and work 2dc chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space round 9 *half_double_crochet across side in chain-2 space 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet * repeat one more time drop color a pick up color b and repeat from * to * twice round 10 *skip next st then half_double_crochet across in chain-2 space 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet * repeat one more time drop color b pick up color a and repeat from * to * twice round 11 * skip next half_double_crochet then single_crochet across in chain-2 space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet * repeat from * to * one more time drop color a pick up color b and repeat from * to * twice intermission half-round single_crochet across one side as in round 11 in chain-2 space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet fasten_off color b pick up color a and single_crochet across one side in chain-2 space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet round 12 continuing with color a *skip next single_crochet then single_crochet across in chain-2 space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet * repeat from * to* two more times for last side skip next single_crochet then single_crochet across in chain-2 space single_crochet and fasten_off weave in the ends and you re done enjoy your dishcloth squaring the spiral dishcloth crochet pattern is copyright 2008 by deborah ellis please do not reproduce this pattern in whole or in part please feel free however to sell any items that you make from this pattern if you have any questions at all please contact the author at neatlytangled@gmail com thank you
